content:
Hi Folks,

Our colleagues in Asia are celebrating the Spring Festival, new year was last week. So can I wish our colleagues a Happy New Year ! - 新年快乐 (Google Translate, please don't let me down!).

We can resume our discussions with the next meeting scheduled for Tuesday 18th of Feb, with USA and Europe.

Happy Year of the Snake! - and speak to you all in 2 weeks time.

Take care,
Chris

PS: I'll be posting an email to the mailing this too.
